objects.text:
925 Sterling Silver Elegance
Perfect Gift for Her
Authenticity Certificate Included
6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a sophisticated and elegant jewelry promotion layout. The central focal point is a high-resolution image of a delicate pair of wreath-shaped earrings, flanked by two overlapping semi-transparent gradient circles that enhance the visual appeal. The title (`heading`) is bold and attention-grabbing, rendered in a large serif font to establish emphasis. It’s followed by a stylized subheading (`subheading`) that supports the luxurious theme. A short product description (`description`) sits beneath, listing the highlights and features with fine spacing. Price (`price`) is prominently styled for quick notice. A call-to-action button (`cta`) in a rounded rectangle (`cta_background`) anchors the design. All elements are framed by decorative minimalistic wave lines and gradient-toned concentric squares that give the design a high-end, feminine flair.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Blush (#FFF5F5)
- Rose Gold (#D89595)
- Deep Rose (#C2686E)
- Rich Brown (#6D4848)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a stunning pair of earrings that blend soft pink rose gold with brilliant white crystals, creating an elegant and feminine aesthetic. The dominant rose gold hue (#F4A6A6) envelops the frame and underlines the floral drop element, giving warmth and subtle luxury. The clear crystals shine with icy white and light gray highlights (#FFFFFF, #D8D8D8), contrasting delicately against the pinkish tone. Sparkles add dynamic reflections, enhancing the premium feel. A soft peach hue (#FADADD) in the petal design blends harmoniously with the pink frame, adding softness. Together, these colors make a romantic and refined palette ideal for ad banners.
